h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: Heavy attacks work very differently than in most action games, as their function differs depending on whether they’re used in or outside of a combo, and also depending on what stance you’re in. When used outside of a combo, they can be charged up to the number of focus points that you have unlocked, with each level of charge dramatically increasing the amount of damage the heavy attack will deal.

The content is as follows:
Heavy attacks work very differently than in most action games, as their function differs depending on whether they’re used in or outside of a combo, and also depending on what stance you’re in. When used outside of a combo, they can be charged up to the number of focus points that you have unlocked, with each level of charge dramatically increasing the amount of damage the heavy attack will deal.
